text: (Omwana waye) Naboola mbu; “Nditsa okhunina khulukulu lwitsa okhuninda okhurulana nende amatsi.” (Nuh)Naboola mbu; “Owumao owulinda yesi yesi nyangayino likhuwa lia Nyasaye, halali ulia awahelesiye tsimbabaasi”, Mana lirunda nilikhupa hakari wabu mana naba mubalia abasikha okhurulana nende amatsi
